data.title: Mammootty: Indian Name Patronymic Given Name
data.meta_description:
5 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This summary provides the essential information about Mammootty in 3 sentences:
Mammootty is an Indian actor and film producer who has appeared in over 410 films in Malayalam and other languages since 1971, establishing himself as one of the leading stars of Malayalam cinema. He is the recipient of several prestigious awards including 3 National Film Awards, 9 Kerala State Film Awards, and 13 Filmfare Awards South. Born in 1951 in Kerala, India, Mammootty continues to star in successful commercial films in his fifth decade in the industry.
